occupation: Home Mortgage Consultant at Wells Fargo Home Mortgage
headline: Home Mortgage Consultant at Wells Fargo Home Mortgage
summary:
I offer an arsenal of home lending products including Jumbo loans, FHA, VA and conventional financing. Wells has the best renovation express loan in the business, featuring a 203k loan we can close in less than 30 days. We are in the advice business of helping our clients understand what the right mortgage is for them. Our loans feature the right payment, down payment and best tax advantage possible.

Specialties: Jumbo FHA and VA home loans

experiences.title: Owner 51%%

experiences.title: Home Mortgage Consultant
experiences.description: I specilize in helping people withreverse mortgages, pledged asset loans, FHA and VA financing, as well as jumbo mortgage options.... If you have a mortgage question or need, I can help you save time and manage the largest debt you will ever have and quite possible save you money. Please don’t hesitate to ask. 904-245-6452
